titles.title: Federal Deposit Insurance Reform Act
To amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to establish a lifetime limit of $100,000 on the amount of deposit insurance any person may obtain.

bill.summary: 10/26/1993--Introduced. Federal Deposit Insurance Reform Act - Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act and the Federal Credit Union Act to mandate a lifetime maximum amount of insurance of $100,000 on insured deposits.
